alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 8:52AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sherman County through 815 AM MDT... At 752 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ruleton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Sherman County. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 1 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
